CustomField.description: Edition Cut-off Days : ( number of days beyond which the payment schedule will be just 1 billing Transaction - for e.g. if order is placed within 60 days of Event Edition Start date then its just 1 Billing Transaction with a Billing Target date of today(). If the difference between today and Event Start date is > “Edition Cut-off Days“ then move to the next level.
CustomField.label: Edition Cut-off Days
